doc:
Tom Chatterton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Chatterton 0 Tom Chatterton (February 12, 1881 – August 17, 1952) was an American actor. Born in Geneva, New York, Chatterton was active in sports as a youth. He gained early acting experience with Ben Horning's stock theater company in Syracuse, New York.He began his film career in 1913 at the New York Motion Picture Company under director Thomas H. Ince. Although never a major star, Chatterton had several leading roles in early silent films. He appeared in a large number of westerns and was able to adapt to talkies allowing him to have a successful career lasting five decades. He died in Hollywood in 1952 and was interred in the Glenwood Cemetery in his hometown of Geneva. Tom_Chatterton ( February_12_,_1881 – August_17_,_1952 ) was an_American_actor . Born in Geneva , New_York , Chatterton was active in sports as a_youth . He gained early_acting_experience with Ben_Horning 's_stock_theater_company in Syracuse , New_York.He began his_film_career in 1913 at the_New_York_Motion_Picture_Company under director_Thomas_H._Ince . Although never_a_major_star , Chatterton had several_leading_roles in early_silent_films . He appeared in a_large_number of westerns and was able to_adapt to talkies allowing him to_have a_successful_career lasting five_decades . He died in Hollywood in 1952 and was_interred in the_Glenwood_Cemetery in his_hometown of Geneva .
